text: un bhaeeyon ne kahaah yadi usane choree kee hai, to usaka ek bhaee bhee isase pahale choree kar chuka hai. to yoosuf ne ye baat apane dil mein chhupa lee aur use unake lie prakat nahin kiya. (yoosuf ne) kahaah sabase bura sthaan tumhaara hai aur allaah use adhik jaanata hai, jo tum kah rahe ho
